Articles.Content: Right now when i click the Load Button in the VAB it isn't bringing anything up, but it works fine inside the SPH. Any ideas whats going on here?

Have you saved anything in the VAB?

And if so, check the save file's VAB folder. That's where all your saved craft files are located.
They are all in there, it just isnt letting me load them

Ships are saved for every savegame seperately - copy them over if you started a new save.

The ships folder not under saves is only for stock crafts - I think, so do not put your ships from an old save/version there.

Stock crafts are disabled for career mode.

Something?

If you're playing a career mode game, any craft you've built anywhere else (say, in the sandbox) will not appear if you haven't unlocked all the prerequisite portions of the tech tree. If that's not the case, check the Ships/VAB sub-directory of the folder corresponding to the name of the save game.
I am having this same issue right now but with the SPH, I have all the prerequisites, and they were in the SPH for a while but today they disappeared.
